pages.text: $(li)The Power enchantment can be applied in any kind of Bow.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the damage from the Arrows fires from the enchanted Bow.
pages.title: Power

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Power).
